news.title: Here's how tariffs could affect the price of goods like shoes and sweaters
news.summary: A model from AlixPartners shows what items like sweaters and shoes imported from Vietnam could cost under President Donald Trump's tariff plans.

news.title: Trump holds call with Xi, Chinese media says
news.summary: The call comes as trade relations between China and the U.S. have come under strain. The two sides tentatively agreed to lower tariffs in the weeks after the deal was reached.

news.title: 10-year Treasury yield falls after jobless claims increase
news.summary: U.S. Treasury yields held steady Thursday. Investors weigh the state of the economy following a slate of disappointing U.N. data.

news.title: Nintendo Switch 2 hype leads to shortages, special store opening hours
news.summary: Nintendo says it expects to sell 15 million Switch 2s in the fiscal year ending March 2026. Analysts say that estimate is conservative.

news.title: NBA team sponsorship revenue up 8% to $1.6 billion, boosted by jersey patches
news.summary: Growth in sponsorships comes on the heels of the NBA's landmark $77 billion media rights deal. The new deal begins next season.

news.title: Jobless claims jump to 8-month high. But it’s probably not a sign of rising layoffs resulting from trade wars.
news.summary: The number of people who applied for unemployment benefits last week jumped to an eight-month high. The details of the government’s report show little evidence of a tariff-related rise in layoffs.

news.title: ‘I’m afraid to ask her’: My stepmother won’t show me my father’s will. What now?
news.summary: “She treats my sibling and me as virtual strangers,” she said. “She’s like a stranger to me.”

news.title: Buy-the-dip retail investors are getting bolder, just when the risks are getting bigger, say analysts
news.summary: Retail investors took a victory lap after their successful April buy-the-dip move. But analysts and strategists worry they are about to run into trouble.

news.title: Circle’s IPO pricing shows Wall Street is clamoring to buy stock in the stablecoin issuer
news.summary: Circle Internet is betting on wider use of its USDC digital currency. USDC is redeemable one-for-one with the U.S. dollar.

news.title: AI is ready to take over our wallets and spend our money for us. What could go wrong?
news.summary: Artificial-intelligence agents help you shop, but are they following your wishes or shaping them? Are they following you wishes or are they shaping your wishes?
